1.2.6.name: wordpress/bookviewer
1.2.6.description:
• The original document is pdf file or word file.
    In order that the plugins works, each pages of the documents shown as samples need to be converted in jpg images.
    The images have to be stored in a wordpress folder /wp-content/uploads/booksamples/

  • Once the plugin is installed and activated, the user put a shortcode in his post/page. The shortcode is shown as a link that the visitor
    can click.
    When the link is clicked on, the first page of the images samples appears. Buttons installed below the page allows visiting pages througth the book.

  • The plugin provides an option to protect any attempt screen capture or rightclick image view, prohibiting the visitors steal the contents of yours edocument.

  • In the option page, users can adjust cross fading between the page swiching, and can choice the backdrop color.

  • A javascript routine adjust the size(inch or mm) of the image to keep the origina
